name: Cut-Out Cookies in a Flower Pot
author: Laura
summary: I received this recipe at a Cake and Candy store when I signed up for a class. We made fall leaves and put them in a clay pot - they looked great! For best flavor results use pure Mexican vanilla the creme de la creme of vanillas. You will need about 6 dozen dowels, cut to approximately 6 inches (with some longer and some shorter) for cookie sticks.
directions: Add eggs and flavorings and mix well
Stir flour, baking powder and salt together
Add to batter and mix well
Chill 3-4 hours or overnight before using
Roll cookies out approximately 1/4 inch thick and insert cookie sticks at least 1/3 to 1/2 way into cookie
Bake cookies at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 8-10 minutes
This dough keeps well in a  covered container in the refrigerator for a couple of weeks
Display 3-7 cookies in a 6 inch clay pot (depending on size of cookie)
Weigh pot down with dried beans and cut a circle of Styrofoam to fit snugly into top
